  • Constructor Details

    • BenderAbilityController

      public BenderAbilityController​(@Nonnull Bender bender)
      Creates bender ability controller object. WARNING: You shouldn't create new bender ability controller object manually. To reach that object, use "bender.getAbilities".
      Parameters:
      bender - Bender.
